summary: The universe is thrown into dimensional chaos as the dead come back to life. Now Goku and Vegeta must track down the cause of this uproar.
cast: Masako Nozawa|Ryô Horikawa|Takeshi Kusao|Daisuke Gôri|Hiromi Tsuru|Naoko Watanabe|Yûko Minaguchi|Hikaru Midorikawa|Jôji Yanami|Toku Nishio|Bin Shimada|Keiko Yamamoto|Ryûji Saikachi|Tesshô Genda|Ryûsei Nakao|Masahiro Anzai|Hideyuki Miyao|Atsushi Kisaichi|Sean Schemmel|Kyle Hebert|Kara Edwards|Christopher Sabat|Laura Bailey|Chris Rager|Cynthia Cranz|Tiffany Vollmer|Dameon Clarke|Stephanie Nadolny|Evan Jones|Kent Williams|Jim Foronda|Linda Young|Justin Cook|Robert Colin|Andrew Rye|Jeremy Inman|Eric Vale|Ahmad Khafe|Amir Khafila|Grace Roiyo
keywords: based on manga|multiple english dubs|villian|violence|song during end credits
title: Dragon Ball Z: Fusión
